title: How do you manage pests and diseases in strawberries? This is what you need to do!

tasks.task: Manage pests and diseases organically on a strawberry farm.
subtasks: Prevent and control leaf spots.
Apply biological control for red spider mites.
Avoid anthracnose and botrytis on strawberries.
Cover fruits with greenhouse paper for protection.
Implement slug control measures using research results.
Protect fruits from birds using netting or chicken mesh.

tasks.task: Set up a low tunneling system.
subtasks: Apply greenhouse paper to beds for protection.
Choose between overhead or low tunneling netting system.
Calculate costs for setting up a strawberry farm.

tasks.task: Share knowledge and engage with community.
subtasks: Like, share, and subscribe to the channel.
